lemme just preface this: i have no nostalgic connection with this game. i didnt grow up with this, or half-life 2 for that matter, and only started playing this game fairly recently. as such, i had a lot more complaints that were less a problem with the game and more a problem with the time period this game came out in. i wont delve into that here, however.

this game is genuinely one of the few games from pre-2000 that i've actually completed. despite feeling dated in some regards, the gameplay is just plain fun. there are sections of the game, specifically towards the end, that just feel a bit too weirdly designed for me to enjoy them. i'd say the game kinda starts to trail off in terms of compelling level design after [spoiler]the military leaves black mesa, and the border world felt like such a chore.[/spoiler] this is pretty much the only negative, however.

onto the positives. my favorite aspect was easily the environmental storytelling that the game has. there arent really any cutscenes, and you can get a lot about the story just from observing your surroundings. this does lead to some slight confusion on the story if you just blazed through it, but for those with a keen eye, it's very compelling from a lore aspect. the overall setting of the game generally feels very realistic (well, realistic in the scenario that theres an alien invasion that starts in the science lab you work at). it's very easy to put yourself in gordon's shoes, since he's just a normal guy. no superhuman abilities, just pure skill that is completely inherited from the player who controls him.

in order not to ramble too much, i will cut this here. overall, would 100% recommend the game, even to people who dont like shooters. prior to this, i'd never really played a shooter and saw it through, and im glad this was my first adventure into the world of fps games. 

tldr: game is very good, albeit dated. if i had to rate it: 8/10
Outdated tbh. Play Black Mesa if you are planning to play through the Half life series. But if you like really old games go for it.
fun and easy to pick up still pretty difficult for me on normal still very fun

Это же легендарная первая часть Халфы. Ну что ж, ребятки, я тут могу сказать. Эта игра по истине прекрасна сама по себе. Этот обзор будет больше для новых поколений людей. Ибо для многих людей из поколения моего либо старше и младше меня это уже давным давно «классика». И так, что же поведает нам игра?) Игра наполнена очень ярким и интересным миром и историей, которая придётся по душе многим. Это одна из жизней, которую стоит прожить. Данная игра в целом рекомендуется для повторного прохождения фанатам и для того, чтобы пустить слезу ностальгии. И для новых людей, чтобы разнообразить свою жизнь в целом, либо увидеть то, что проходили люди раньше и оценить просто хороший и достойный проект от великой компании Valve. Эта игра и является прородителем CS. Не было бы Халфы, не было бы и вашего «КС») Низкий поклон создателям Стима))))
the multiplayer is 1000000x better than any counter strike, the game is made in 1998 and still better than lots of games made today
1998 год, но для нас не плохо. Если что можно поиграть в Black Mesa.
just download it to experience what half life is all about

A absolute classic from the late 90's, albeit one that hasn't aged that well, with a lot of the visuals and sounds being rather rough, and the gameplay not always being to fun either (especially on hard difficulty). despite all of that tho, it still makes for a great time if you like FPS games and can get past it's age and more rough aspects. If you do play this tho, remember this: Run, Think, Shoot, Live.

Valve makes good games. When they aren't flawlessly hosting a better games retailer than EGS, Valve is busy making couplets of games. Half-Life is one of said game couplets that has managed to weather the test of time and remains, to this day, one of the best designed, most engaging FPS titles of all time. The combat is incredible for a game that is >20 years old. The world design is top notch, arguably the best in the industry until the likes of BotW and RDR2 came around. The story telling is beyond what could have expected from a 90s title, much less one with a silent protagonist. The puzzles are rock solid, evidence that the Valve design mantra that has held through to modern titles was present from day 1. All that and the game on the OG engine was update 22 years after the game was released and replaced by a remake with an updated engine. Don't be scared off by the age of the game, pick up the entire Orange Box and give this classic a playthrough.

Vay be ! 20 saatlik serüvenin ardından hayatımda ilk defa oynayıp bitirdim ve gerçekten, keşke daha önce duyduğumda biraz dikkate alıp oynasaymışım diyorum. Gerçekten o yılda böyle bir oyun... Aklım almıyor hayran kaldım diyebileceğim başka bir şey yok. Grafikleri umurumda değil gerek hikayesi, gerek hikayeyi anlatışı, gerek oyun içindeki bulmacaları çeşitlilikleri olsun; her şeyiyle mükemmeldi. Eğer benim gibi bu yıla kadar denememiş olanlar varsa (zannetmiyorum ama) beklemeyin alıp bitirin hemen derim :)
